name: hmpps-manage-a-workforce-ui-e2e-tests
description: e2e tests repo for ui in playwright ts

scripts.clean:reports: npx rimraf allure-results allure-report test-results playwright-report
scripts.test:smoke:chrome: npm run clean:reports && npx playwright test --project=chromium --reporter=allure-playwright -g smoke
scripts.test:regression:chrome: npm run clean:reports && npx playwright test --project=chromium --reporter=allure-playwright -g regression
scripts.test:chrome: npm run clean:reports && npx playwright test --project=chromium --reporter=allure-playwright
scripts.test:firefox: npm run clean:reports && npx playwright test --project=firefox --reporter=allure-playwright
scripts.test:webkit: npm run clean:reports && npx playwright test --project=webkit --reporter=allure-playwright
scripts.test:chrome:headed: npm run clean:reports && npx playwright test --project=chromium --headed --reporter=allure-playwright
scripts.test:firefox:headed: npm run clean:reports && npx playwright test --project=firefox --headed --reporter=allure-playwright
scripts.test:webkit:headed: npm run clean:reports && npx playwright test --project=webkit --headed --reporter=allure-playwright
scripts.posttest:ci:allure: npm run report && npm run allure:generate
